mapper.update: update events_stages_history set END_EVENT_ID = #{END_EVENT_ID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, EVENT_NAME = #{EVENT_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOURCE = #{SOURCE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIMER_START = #{TIMER_START,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TIMER_END = #{TIMER_END,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TIMER_WAIT = #{TIMER_WAIT,jdbcType=BIGINT}, WORK_COMPLETED = #{WORK_COMPLETED,jdbcType=BIGINT}, WORK_ESTIMATED = #{WORK_ESTIMATED,jdbcType=BIGINT}, NESTING_EVENT_ID = #{NESTING_EVENT_ID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, NESTING_EVENT_TYPE = #{NESTING_EVENT_TYPE,jdbcType=CHAR} where THREAD_ID = #{THREAD_ID,jdbcType=BIGINT} and EVENT_ID = #{EVENT_ID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select THREAD_ID, EVENT_ID, END_EVENT_ID, EVENT_NAME, SOURCE, TIMER_START, TIMER_END, TIMER_WAIT, WORK_COMPLETED, WORK_ESTIMATED, NESTING_EVENT_ID, NESTING_EVENT_TYPE from events_stages_history
